name: 20 Doors
description:
20 Doors is a first person exploration, action and puzzle solving adventure where strange events and environments make you question your sanity.

Lost and confused, your adventure starts on a small makeshift pier.
The sand is thick and mucky; the smell is sour and it makes your eyes water.
There seems to be only one thing you can do: move forward into the dark misty unknown.



Let your imagination wander as you explore a variety of odd yet facinating locations and face the untrustworthy things lurking in the shadows.
Answer those questions that might naturally appear the farther and deeper you go.



Will you dare to step deeper in the dark misty forests or peak behind that moldy wall as you constantly ask yourself;
has it been watching me the whole time?

With high quality graphics, global illumination and ambient occlusion for improved lighting; as well HDR support.
